sentences.content: An increase in survey effort has led to an increase in our knowledge of the location of coral
gardens. Recruitment, which indicates recovery towards a more favorable condition status, has
been reported in one MPA, evidencing the positive impact of protected area designation. However,
the overall status of the habitat is considered to be poor due to the impact of ongoing fishing
